page.title: 17PLAY GROUND GAMES
page.content: These are some of the games we play in our play-ground at school : French skipping, Blue bird, I sent a letter, Mother may I, My red letter, Kissy cat, The A-Team, Football, Netball, Hide and seek, Snobs, Chips, Television and Give us a clue. My favourite of these is French skipping. It is a skipping game using a piece of elastic. Three people play, one person at each end with the elastic round their ankles. You have to jump in certain patterns over and on to the elastic. When you have done a whole rhyme, the elastic is moved up to knee level and then thigh level. If you get a bit wrong then you change places with one of the people at the end and they have a turn. My favourite rhyme is Jingle, Jangle.
